Polynomial PtByPt VIs

Owning Palette: Point By Point VIs

Requires: Full Development System. This topic might not match its corresponding palette in LabVIEW depending on your operating system, licensed product(s), and target.

Use the Polynomial PtByPt VIs to perform calculations and evaluations with polynomials.

The VIs on this palette can return point by point error codes.

Palette ObjectDescription
1D Linear Evaluation PtByPtPerforms a linear evaluation of x.
1D Polynomial Evaluation PtByPtPerforms a polynomial evaluation of x using Coefficients: a.
